Quad-band XRS / YangWang Satellite Receiver

April 16, 2025

Focus: A high-dynamic, high-sensitivity satellite receiver designed for commercial aerospace onboard applications.

These studies were primarily applied to commercial spacecraft, requiring high-sensitivity signal reception at low cost and supporting main frequency bands GPS L1/L2 and Beidou B1/B3. I was fully responsible for the software development, which included designing protocols and features according to client requirements, implementing the software, conducting system reliability testing, and providing ongoing software maintenance.
